onboarding.intro: Welcome to Rainbows, an assessment tool by Unicorn that helps you better understand yourself and your business. Let's start by grabbing your email so that we can save and send your results once you complete the journey! It only takes five minutes to complete this portion and start building your 360 degree view of your business.
onboarding.name: Name
onboarding.textarea: What are you hoping to achieve with this test?
